items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, cheap dresses!
items.body: I have 4 of these dresses now. Super comfy, packable and the wash and wear well! Purchased this one and another this time for a cruise. Read more
items.author: Stacey Silver

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Design is so cute, itâ€™s not the cutest on a postpartum belly ðŸ™ƒ
items.body: THIS DRESS! It is so freaking cute, and there are so many pattern options that I wanted because they all look amazing. The fabric is so lightweight and has good stretch and I love that it has pockets! If only I had a model body hah I donâ€™t super love the way it hangs on my belly and hips and I feel like the slit comes up a little higher than I would like, but Iâ€™ll try again in the summer as a cute cover-up or casual dress. I love having outfits that are easy to throw on and this is definitely one of them! Read more
items.author: Shaelyn Hill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Length is perfect
items.body: Bought this for a tropical vacation. Perfect fit , packs nicely in suitcase and doesnâ€™t wrinkle . Read more

items.author: arlene knowles

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft fabric, runs small
items.body: Runs small. Nice soft fabric. Good length Read more
items.author: C. Green

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile Olive Green Dress Youâ€™ll Wear Everywhere
items.body: This olive green cotton dress is such a versatile piece! The color is beautiful and flattering, and the stretchy fabric makes it soft and comfortable to wear all day. I love that it can be styled casually for errands or dressed up with accessories for an evening out. You can wear this with sandals, sneakers, or ankle boots. This dress also looks great with a denim jacket or cardigan thrown on over it with long or short necklaces. The possibilities are endless on how to style this dress that I am certain will be a staple in your wardrobe like it is mine. The fit is more on the fitted side rather than loose, which gives it a polished look while still being easy to throw on. Overall, itâ€™s a great wardrobe staple that combines comfort with style. Mine still looks new after several washes because I let it air dry after washing versus putting it in the dryer. I definitely give this dress 5 stars and would purchase it again in other colors. Read more
items.author: Rachel Gebhardt

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's an ok dress
items.body: I ordered 2 of these dresses. One a solid color and one a tropical print. I'm keeping the solid color but the tropical print was returned. The printed dress added extra pounds. The quality is not the best but was as expected for the cost. The solid color can be dressed up with some nice jewelry. It will be a cute beach dress. Read more
items.author: KATHLEEN

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Yellow Rose, Floral Blue Boho, Floral Pink Frond, Floral Leopard, Plain Green, Floral Black Leaves, Floral Frond, Floral Lily, Plain Black, Plain Red, Floral Boho 1, Floral Boho Striped, Floral Striped, Floral Coconut Leaves. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
